fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__SHOTGUN WEDDING__]: Requires 2 Combo. Attack a player. Gain 1 Combo if they were attacked by another player than you tonight.
- [__CROPDUST__]: Requires 3 Combo. Poison a player. Gain 1 Combo for each visitor they have, not including you.
- [__POTATO INSTALL__]: Requires 5 Combo. All your attacks and poisons from now on are rampages.
- Overdrive (__PITCHFORK's ETERNAL DREAM__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
